data.title: World Headquarters
data.meta_description: Panduit designed our world headquarters, a LEED Gold certified building, leveraging the Unified Physical Infrastructure approach that integrates core building systems into a single, unified infrastructure to drive operational and financial advantages.
data.text:
Just like the customers we serve, our success is linked to our ability to quickly and efficiently solve business challenges and scale to meet customer needs. That’s why when we decided to invest in a new world headquarters — a key business asset— we looked to our own Unified Physical Infrastructure℠ approach as a roadmap.

The result is a Leadership in Energy and Environmental Design (LEED) Gold certified building that integrates all of the core building systems into a single, unified infrastructure that enables data sharing and monitoring, easy communication and the ability to respond quickly to any issues.

Solutions that drive smart business.

Our world headquarters building is just one example of how our solutions for Data Center and the Enterprise coupled with the expertise of our Panduit Services Group and robust partner ecosystem, work together to solve real-world challenges. We welcome the opportunity to work with you to develop the right solutions for your business.
